channel.title: Wizard101
channel.description:
Most of you have probably never heard/tried this game, but it's amazing. At first I assumed it would be a kiddies game which is generally boring. It's actually quite a fun game, I would definitely recommend you try it.
https://www.wizard101.com/
I first saw it being advertised on youtube and only started it recently (my name is Tom5001 for those who wish to speak to me).
Wizard101 is a game in which you are a student at a magical school (graphics like WoW imo) you must advance levels and fight numerous NPCs, it also comes with a thriving player base that you can duel and interact with.
There is also a quests system and so on, once you advance levels you can cast better spells which can potentially do more damage to your opposition or heal you/give you an advantage. The entire game is explained in a quick 10 minute interactive tutorial where you fight some guys enemies in a duel.

item.title: Wizard101
item.dc:creator: @nL1 nL
item.description:
@nL1 wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:18, topic:406170”][quote author=nL link=topic=503167.msg3689660#msg3689660 date=1312043756]

I tried the game, I just couldn’t find it being fun to me… so I quit.

I guess it depends what type of gamer you are, I don’t find runescape fun anymore, but I do find Minecraft fun.

I find the game fun myself, because I find that it has alot of questing… And I love questing, that’s one of the reasons I love Oblivion… :o
[/quote]Oblivion and all of the games in the tes series are one of the few games you can count on to be good. one of my most favorite games.[/quote]

+1

Read full topic

item.title: Wizard101
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“vexx1345, post:11, topic:406170”][quote]
@vex how does it have a combat system anything to that of runescape? its turn based and is only magic …
[/quote]
turn based is kinda like rs… I mean one person hits you hit and so on and so forth. well i guess its because i barely play anymore that it seems the same.[/quote]In wizard101 you have to let your opponent attack you before you can attack them back, in runescape you can continuously attack your opponent without them attacking back

Read full topic

item.title: Wizard101
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:4, topic:406170”][quote author=GML Programmer link=topic=503167.msg3681075#msg3681075 date=1311534572]
dont you have to pay for like everything though? I played this a little, but you couldnt do more than a few quests/get a few spell cards/go to certain areas unless you paid.
[/quote]

I’m either very slow, or you’re very fast I’ve been on it all day and haven’t been asked to pay yet >.>

I’m sure it’ll hit me at one point, but I’d probably pay for it!

O.o Are you serious Tom D:

Yes. I admit I laughed on the IRC about this game myself, now I’m the one recommending it :P[/quote]
When i use to play all of the available free quests and what not would only get you to level 9, its probably changed since then but once you complete all of the quests in basically impossible to level up anymore. once i started to pay for the game i spent like 7-8 hours a day on it trying to get a sword >.> i got to level 38 then quit. but its a really fun game.

@vex how does it have a combat system anything to that of runescape? its turn based and is only magic …

Read full topic
